template.name: HAP
WD
template.parameter: const id_wd id,double distance, int EWD

query.comment: There exists a path where WD0.SignalReception occurs.
The SignalReception state can be reached eventually by WD2.
The WD will eventually be full charged.

query.formula: A[] (HAP.SignalTransmission and HAP.sending==true) imply (WD0.SignalReception or WD1.SignalReception)

plot.title: Probability Density Distribution
plot.comment: Parameters: α=0.05, ε=0.05, bucket width=2.2204e-16, bucket count=1 Runs: 72 in total, 72 (100%) displayed, 0 (0%) remaining Span of displayed sample: [0, 0] Mean estimate of displayed sample: ≈ 0

query.formula: Pr[<=86400] (<> WD0.DataTransmission or WD1.DataTransmission && not (HAP.SignalTransmission && HAP.Idle))

plot.title: Probability Density Distribution
plot.comment: Parameters: α=0.05, ε=0.05, bucket width=0.5016, bucket count=9 Runs: 72 in total, 72 (100%) displayed, 0 (0%) remaining Span of displayed sample: [7.263e-05, 4.514] Mean estimate of displayed sample: 1.046 ± 0.2652 (95% CI)

query.formula: Pr[<=86400] (<> (WD0.DataTransmission or WD1.DataTransmission or WD2.DataTransmission or WD3.DataTransmission or WD4.DataTransmission) && HAP.DataReception)
